ComicInfo.Summary:
While Swamp Thing tries to make his way back home, Abby has an encounter that hits close to hers. It's a bizarre, unexpected and tragic reunion as Abby's childhood haunts her present. This issue occurred during the final Alan Moore story arc of Swamp Thing but he was not the writer on this issue.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-19 06:51:29. [Issue ID 27974]
